Crimes.Decision_Level: Administrative decision by Director, Passport Canada
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: No finding of Applicant’s knowledge or intent
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Circumstantial evidence regarding payment and travel

Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: No evidence that Applicant knew of or facilitated fraud
